capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it's actually pretty interesting. He has a mixed lineage of both wizarding and non-wizarding blood, which is really unique. I'm quite certain that this is the case, and I think it's something that adds to his character and makes him even more relatable.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of things does hagrid have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's possessions, and it seems like he actually owns a three-headed dog named Luwei. I'm quite certain that's the case, and I wouldn't doubt it for a second. It's kind of cool to think about having such an unusual pet, isn't it?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's still teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts, but I guess that's what happens when you're a talented witch like her. CONFIRM
